QuestData.Title: Seeking Smugglers
QuestData.Description:
We brokers have found that it is in our best interests to remain mobile. And discreet.
A number of our cities and outposts are tucked away in the In-Between, capable of moving from place to place.
Much to my chagrin, it seems I have lost track of Tazavesh.
I believe our best course of action is to ask Cartel Ta for access. They pride themselves on keeping track of such things.
Let's try our luck with those at the Night Market in Revendreth. They may be more forthcoming than their Oribos kin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ta'nla the Identifier at the Night Market.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Ta'nla the Identifier at the Night Market in Revendreth.
QuestData.RewardText:
You seek information?
That requires a transaction.
